attributes.action: Save the Routemaster on Heritage Route 9 - TfL are thinking of scrapping the old Routemaster on route 9
attributes.additional_details: Transport for London are discussing the possibility of scrapping the old Routemaster buses from route 9. This petition is designed to prevent this happening. The old Routemaster bus is part of London's heritage and is an icon. It would be a crime to scrap it.
